id.description: The item ID of the item set. The ID must be unique.

name.description: The name of the item set. The default language of the system is used.

categories.description: The array with categories of the item set. The category ID key  "categoryId" must be specified. Example for JSON Object:  "categories":[{"categoryId":"34"},{"categoryId":"35"}]}]

id.description: The item set component ID. The ID must be unique.

setId.description: The item ID of the item set. The ID must be unique.

itemId.description: The item ID of the set component

quantity.description: The number of copies of the component that are part of the set. Default quantity is 1.

isPurchasable.description: Flag that indicates if enough stock is available for at least one variation of the component to cover the specified quantity.

setId.description: set id The item ID of the item set. The ID must be unique.

rebate.description: The discount in percent to be subtracted from the sum of the prices of the selected set components.

minPrice.description: The minimum price of the sum of all components; read only

maxPrice.description: the maximum price of the sum of all components; read only

isPurchasable.description: Flag that indicates if all components of the set have sufficient stock. Purchasability of a set depends on the component with the lowest stock.

id.description: The unique ID of the attribute.

backendName.description: The back end name of the attribute. The name must be unique and must not contain commas, colons, semicolons or quotation marks. It is not visible in the plentymarkets front end.

position.description: The position of the attribute. Attributes are displayed in the attribute overview in ascending order by position.

isSurchargePercental.description: Flag that indicates if the surcharge is percental.

isLinkableToImage.description: Flag that indicates if an image can be linked to the attribute.

amazonAttribute.description: The attribute of the market Amazon that this attribute is liked to. To list variations on this market, attributes must be linked to one of the attributes specified by the market. Check documentation of the market for permitted values.

fruugoAttribute.description: The attribute of the market Fruugo that this attribute is linked to. To list variations on this market, attributes must be linked to one of the attributes specified by the market.

pixmaniaAttribute.description: The attribute of the market PIXmania that this attribute is linked to. To list variations on this market, attributes must be linked to one of the attributes specified by the market. Check documentation of the market for permitted values.

ottoAttribute.description: The attribute of the market OTTO that this attribute is linked to. To list variations on this market, attributes must be linked to one of the attributes specified by the market.

googleShoppingAttribute.description: The attribute of the market Google Shopping that this attribute is linked to. To list variations on this market, attributes must be linked to one of the attributes specified by the market.

neckermannAtEpAttribute.description: The component of the market neckermann AT EP that this attribute is linked to. To list variations on this market, attributes must be linked to one of the components specified by the market. Check documentation of the market for permitted values.

typeOfSelectionInOnlineStore.description: How customers can select the attribute in the front end of a client. To allow attribute selection by check mark, attribute availability must be checked on the client side.

laRedouteAttribute.description: The attribute of the market La Redoute that this attribute is linked to. To list variations on this market, attributes must be linked to one of the attributes specified by the market. Check documentation of the market for permitted values.

isGroupable.description: Flag that indicates if the attribute can be grouped in item lists. If yes, variations with this attribute can be shown in the ItemViewCategoriesList template first. Other attributes are nested and can only be selected after this attribute has been selected.

marketId.description: The unique ID of the market.

attributeId.description: The unique ID of the attribute.

name.description: The name of the attribute map. The name must be unique and must not contain commas, colons, semicolons or quotation marks. It is not visible in the plentymarkets front end.

lang.description: The language of the attribute.

name.description: The name of the attribute. This attribute name is displayed in the online store.

id.description: The unique ID of the attribute value.

attributeId.description: The unique ID of the attribute associated with the attribute value.

backendName.description: The back end name of the attribute value. This name can only be assigned once per attribute. It is not visible in the plentymarkets front end.

position.description: The position of the attribute value. Attribute values are sorted in ascending order by position.

image.description: The name of the image associated with the attribute value; naming pattern is attr\_\{valueId\}.

comment.description: Optional comment on the attribute value. Comments are not visible in the plentymarkets front end.

amazonValue.description: The attribute value of the market Amazon that this attribute value maps to. To list variations on this market, attribute values must be linked to one of the values specified by the market. Check documentation of the market for permitted values.

ottoValue.description: The attribute value of the market OTTO that this attribute value maps to. To list variations on this market, attribute values must be linked to one of the attribute values specified by the market.

neckermannAtEpValue.description: The attribute value of the market Neckermann AT EP that this attribute value maps to. To list variations on this market, attribute values must be linked to one of the attribute values specified by the market. Check documentation of the market for permitted values.

laRedouteValue.description: The attribute value of the market La Redoute that this attribute value maps to. To list variations on this market, attribute values must be linked to one of the attribute values specified by the market. Check documentation of the market for permitted values.

percentageDistribution.description: The percentage for automatic stock distribution of attribute values. When reordering an item, the quantities of attribute values is automatically distributed among the total quantity.

imageId.description: The unique ID of the image

itemId.description: The unique ID of the item

attributeId.description: The unique ID of the attribute

valueId.description: The unique ID of the attribute value

marketId.description: The unique ID of the market.

attributeId.description: The unique ID of the attribute.

attributeValueId.description: The unique ID of the attribute value.

name.description: The name of the attribute value map. The name must be unique and must not contain commas, colons, semicolons or quotation marks. It is not visible in the plentymarkets front end.

valueId.description: The unique ID of the attribute value.

lang.description: The language of the attribute value market.

name.description: The name of the attribute value market.

valueId.description: The unique ID of the attribute value.

lang.description: The language of the attribute value.

name.description: The name of the attribute value. This attribute value name is displayed in the online store.

id.description: The ID of this availability

averageDays.description: The average delivery time in days for this availability

availabilityId.description: The ID of the availability that the name belongs to

lang.description: The language code of the availability name

name.description: The name of the item availability in the specified language

id.description: The unique ID of the barcode

name.description: The name of the barcode

type.description: The type of the barcode. Possible values: GTIN_8, GTIN_13, GTIN_14, GTIN_128, ISBN, QR, CODE_128, UPC

createdAt.description: The time the code was created.

barcodeId.description: The unique ID of the barcode

referrerId.description: The unique ID of the referrer. To activate all referrers, the value -1 must be specified. This value activates all referrers in the system by default, including any referrers added at a later stage.

createdAt.description: The time the barcode was created.

updatedAt.description: The time the barcode was last updated.

itemId.description: The unique ID of the item to which cross-selling items are linked

crossItemId.description: The unique ID of the cross-selling item that is linked to the item

relationship.description:
The cross-selling relationship between item and cross-selling item. Possible values:
  • Accessory = The cross-selling item is an accessory of the item.
  • ReplacementPart = The cross-selling item is a replacement part for the item.
  • Similar = The cross-selling item is similar to the item.
  • Bundle = The cross-selling item is suitable to be sold as a bundle with the item.

isDynamic.description: Flag that indicates if the cross-selling link was generated automatically.

id.description: The unique ID of the image

itemId.description: The unique ID of the item the image is associated with

fileType.description: The file format of the image. Possible file formats: jpg, jpeg, png, gif, svg

path.description: The path under which the image is saved.

position.description: The position of the image. The position is used for sorting images in the online store.

createdAt.description: The time the image was uploaded.

updatedAt.description: The time the image details were last updated.

md5Checksum.description: The MD5 hash value of the image file

md5ChecksumOriginal.description: The MD5 hash value of the original image file

size.description: The size of the image in pixels

width.description: The width of the image in pixels

height.description: The height of the image in pixels

url.description: The URL under which the image can be accessed after the upload.

urlMiddle.description: The URL that points to the  medium-sized version of the item image.

urlPreview.description: The URL that points to the  first preview version of the item image.

urlSecondPreview.description: The URL that points to the second preview version of the item image.

names.description: Lists the image's name details as an array. (List)

availabilities.description: Lists the image's availability details as an array. (List)

imageId.description: The ID of the image. The ID must be unique.

type.description:
The type of referrer for which the image is available. Possible types:
  • mandant = The image can be made available for clients (stores).
  • marketplace = The image can be made available for markets.
  • listing = The image can be made available for listings.

value.description:
For the type mandant, this is the plentyID of the client (store) for which the image is available. For the types marketplace and listing, this is the ID of the referrer for which the image is available.
  • -1.00 = The image is available for all referrers of this type.

imageId.description: The ID of the image. The ID must be unique.

lang.description: The language of the image name

name.description: The name of the image in the specified language

alternate.description: The alternative name of the image in the specified language

id.description: The unique ID of the link between item and shipping profile

itemId.description: The unique ID of the item

profileId.description: The unique ID of the shipping profile

id.description: The ID of the item. The ID must be unique.

position.description: The position of the item

itemType.description: The type of the item. Because Set items are managed using a separate route, this value is always Default.

stockType.description:
The stock type of the item. Possible values:
  • 0 = Stocked item (default)
  • 1 = Production item
  • 2 = Colli
  • 3 = Special order item

storeSpecial.description:
Option to present items more prominently in the online store.
  • 1 = Special offer
  • 2 = New items
  • 3 = Top items

ownerId.description: The plentymarkets user that is assigned as owner of this item.

manufacturerId.description: The ID of the manufacturer of the item

producingCountryId.description: The ID of the country in which the item was manufactured.

mainVariationId.description: The ID of the main variation of the item. The ID must be unique.

customsTariffNumber.description: The customs tariff number of the item; usually a 11 digit code number based on the Harmonised System

revenueAccount.description: The revenue account the item is linked to. An individual revenue account can be saved for each item in plentymarkets. If this is not done, plentymarkets automatically determines a revenue account based on the VAT rate.

couponRestriction.description:
Indicates if the item can be purchased using a promotional coupon.
  • 0 = Permitted
  • 1 = Not permitted
  • 2 = Purchasable with coupon only

condition.description:
The condition of the item. Possible values:
  • 0 = New
  • 1 = Used
  • 2 = Boxed as new
  • 3 = New with label
  • 4 = Factory seconds

conditionApi.description:
The condition of the item that is transferred to markets via API.
  • 0 = New
  • 1 = Used but as new
  • 2 = Used but very good
  • 3 = Used but good
  • 4 = Used but acceptable
  • 5 = Factory seconds

createdAt.description: Timestamp of the date and time the item was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp of the last date and time the item was updated.

isSubscribable.description: Flag that indicates if the item can be ordered as a subscription item. If yes, the item can be ordered for delivery at regular intervals.

isSerialNumber.description: Flag that indicates if serial numbers are to be assigned to variations of this item to uniquely identify every item sold. Serial numbers ensure traceability of an item in case of errors or problems.

isShippingPackage.description: Flag that indicates if a shipping package is to be used for this item. If yes and the variation's dimensions are entered in the Settings tab of a variation, the correct shipping package is assigned automatically.

amazonFbaPlatform.description:
Indicates the platform used for Fulfilment by Amazon (FBA).
  • 0 = Do not use
  • 1 = AMAZON EU (Europe)
  • 2 = AMAZON FE (Far East)
  • 3 = AMAZON NA (North America)

isShippableByAmazon.description: Flag that indicates if the item can be shipped with Amazon Multi-Channel. Amazon Multi-Channel Fulfillment is a service for fulfilling orders from sales channels other than Amazon platforms using inventory stored in the Amazon fulfillment center.

amazonProductType.description: The Amazon product type of the item. List of IDs: https://www.plentymarkets.co.uk/manual/data-exchange/data-formats/item/

amazonFedas.description: The FEDAS product classification key of the item.

ebayPresetId.description: The eBay preset ID. This plentymarkets ID must be specified to save values for $ebayCategory, $ebayCategory2, $ebayStoreCategory and $ebayStoreCategory2.

ebayCategory.description: The eBay category 1 of the item. This category is used when a new listing is created.

ebayCategory2.description: The eBay category 2 of the item. This category is used when a new listing is created.

ebayStoreCategory.description: The ID of the eBay store category 1 of the item. This value is used for new listings.

ebayStoreCategory2.description: The ID of the eBay store category 2 of the item. This value is used for new listings.

rakutenCategoryId.description: The ID of the Rakuten category of this item.

flagOne.description: Flag 1 of the item. Flags can be used to organise and filter items. Each item can be assigned up to two flags. Possible values: 1 to 31, 0 = no flag

flagTwo.description: Flag 2 of the item. Flags can be used to organise and filter items. Each item can be assigned up to two flags. Possible values: 1 to 11, 0 = no flag

ageRestriction.description:
The age customers must be to purchase the item. Items with an age rating of 18+ must be linked to a shipping profile for which the PostIdent option is activated.
  • 0 = None available
  • 3 = Released for ages 3 and up
  • 6 = Ages 6 and up
  • 9 = Ages 9 and up
  • 12 = Ages 12 and up
  • 14 = Ages 14 and up
  • 16 = Ages 16 and up
  • 18 = Ages 18 and up
  • 50 = Not marked
  • 88 = Not required
  • 99 = Unknown

feedback.description: The feedback, i.e. rating, that this item received. Possible values are 1 to 5 or 1 to 10 depending on the maximum rating setting. An initial feedback can be saved for items. The saved value will then be displayed as the initial feedback. Every time new feedback is submitted, the average value will be recalculated automatically.

free1.description: The content of the free text field 1. This can be displayed in the online store or on eBay.

free2.description: The content of the free text field 2. This can be displayed in the online store or on eBay.

free3.description: The content of the free text field 3. This can be displayed in the online store or on eBay.

free4.description: The content of the free text field 4. This can be displayed in the online store or on eBay.

free5.description: The content of the free text field 5. This can be displayed in the online store or on eBay.

free6.description: The content of the free text field 6. This can be displayed in the online store or on eBay.

free7.description: The content of the free text field 7. This can be displayed in the online store or on eBay.

free8.description: The content of the free text field 8. This can be displayed in the online store or on eBay.

free9.description: The content of the free text field 9. This can be displayed in the online store or on eBay.

free10.description: The content of the free text field 10. This can be displayed in the online store or on eBay.

free11.description: The content of the free text field 11. This can be displayed in the online store or on eBay.

free12.description: The content of the free text field 12. This can be displayed in the online store or on eBay.

free13.description: The content of the free text field 13. This can be displayed in the online store or on eBay.

free14.description: The content of the free text field 14. This can be displayed in the online store or on eBay.

free15.description: The content of the free text field 15. This can be displayed in the online store or on eBay.

free16.description: The content of the free text field 16. This can be displayed in the online store or on eBay.

free17.description: The content of the free text field 17. This can be displayed in the online store or on eBay.

free18.description: The content of the free text field 18. This can be displayed in the online store or on eBay.

free19.description: The content of the free text field 19. This can be displayed in the online store or on eBay.

free20.description: The content of the free text field 20. This can be displayed in the online store or on eBay.

maximumOrderQuantity.description: The maximum order quantity of an item permitted per order. If a maximum order quantity is specified, no more than this quantity of any combination of the variations of the item can be ordered. Decimal values are possible to allow orders by weight or length. Default value is 0. If value is 0, the maximum order quantity is unlimited.

id.description: The unique ID of the manufacturer.

name.description: The name of the manufacturer

externalName.description: The external name of the manufacturer. The external name is used for the item export to external markets. If no external name is saved, the Name will be used. The external name will also be transferred to FINDOLOGIC and will be indexed for item searches.

logo.description: The URL of the manufacturer's logo

url.description: The URL of the manufacturer's website

street.description: The street of the manufacturer's address

houseNo.description: The house number of the manufacturer's address

postcode.description: The postal code of the manufacturer's address

town.description: The town of the manufacturer's address

phoneNumber.description: The phone number of the manufacturer

faxNumber.description: The fax number of the manufacturer

email.description: The email address of the manufacturer

countryId.description: The ID of the country in which the manufacturer is based; 0 = unknown.

pixmaniaBrandId.description: The manufacturer's ID on the market Pixmania

neckermannAtEpBrandId.description: The manufacturer's ID on the market Neckermann Austria, Enterprise version

laRedouteBrandId.description: The manufacturer's ID on the market La Redoute

position.description: The position of the manufacturer

updatedAt.description: The time the manufacturer information was last updated.

id.description: The unique ID of the manufacturer commission

manufacturerId.description: The unique ID of the manufacturer

plentyId.description: The unique ID of the client (store) that the commission applies to. The route /rest/webstores provides access to clients (stores).

referrerId.description: The unique ID of the referrer that the commission applies to. The route /rest/orders/referrers provides access to referrers.

commission.description: The manufacturer commission value in percent

id.description: The ID of the property

position.description: The position of the property

propertyGroupId.description: The ID of the property group the property is assigned to. Value is null if property is not assigned to a property group.

unit.description: The unit of measurement of the property. Value is null if no unit is associated.

backendName.description: The backend name of the property. The back end name is not visible to customers.

comment.description: Internal comment/note saved for the property. Internal comments are not visible to customers.

valueType.description:
Permitted property values are:
  • empty = No property type
  • int = A whole number can be saved for an item, e.g. a size.
  • float = A number with decimal places can be saved for an item, e.g. a measurement.
  • selection = One of several options can be saved for the item. The values of the property value Selection can be managed using the route PropertySelection.
  • text = Text can be saved for an item.
  • file = A file can be saved for an item.

isSearchable.description: Flag that indicates if items can be found by entering the property name as a search term.

isOderProperty.description: Flag that indicates if the property is available in the order process. Depending on the property type, customers e.g. can enter a text or value or select an option from a drop-down list.

isShownOnItemPage.description: Flag that indicates if the property will be shown on the item's page in the online store-

isShownOnItemList.description: Flag that indicates if the property will be shown in the item listing in the online store.

isShownAtCheckout.description: Flag that indicates if the property will be shown in the order process.

isShownInPdf.description: Flag that indicates if the property will be shown in PDF documents.

surcharge.description: The surcharge for the property. Surcharges will automatically be added to the item price in the detailed view of an item and in the order process. The default value is 0.00, i.e. no surcharge. In the plentymarkets front end, the template variable PriceDynamic displays the price of a variation including the surcharge.

updatedAt.description: The time the property was last updated.

id.description: The unique ID of the property group

backendName.description: The back end name of the property group. This name is not visible to customers.

orderPropertyGroupingType.description:
Indicates how order properties are grouped for selection in the order process. This parameter is applicable to order properties of the type None only.
  • none = Order properties are not grouped.
  • single = One of the grouped order properties can be selected from the drop-down list.
  • multi = Multiple order properties can be selected.

isSurchargePercental.description: Flag that indicates if surcharge values are calculated in percent.

propertyId.description: The unique ID of the property

componentId.description: The unique ID of the reference for the market

marketId.description: The unique ID of the market

externalComponent.description: The external reference of the property

propertyId.description: The unique ID of the property

lang.description: The language code of the property name

name.description: The name of the property. The property name is displayed in the online store.

description.description: The description of the property. The property description is displayed in the online store.

id.description: The unique ID of the selection

propertyId.description: The unique ID of the property

lang.description: The code of the language for which name and description of the selection were saved.

name.description: The name of the selection. The name is displayed in the online store.

description.description: The description of the selection. This description is displayed in the online store.

id.description: The unique ID of the sales price

position.description: The position of the sales price

minimumOrderQuantity.description: The minimum order quantity of the sales price. Sales prices with different minimum quantities can be used to create a quantity based graduation of prices in plentymarkets.

type.description:
The price type of the sales price.
  • RRP = Sales price is the recommended retail price (RRP). If the RRP and another sales price are linked with a variation, the RRP will be displayed in the online store as red strike-through text next to the sales price.
  • Special offer = Sales price as a special offer. Special offers are used for markets, e.g. Amazon and Hitmeister.

isCustomerPrice.description: Flag that indicates if the sales price is a customer price. Currently, this setting is not in use.

isDisplayedByDefault.description: Flag that indicates if the sales price is displayed automatically in the Sales Prices area of the plentymarkets backend when a new item is created. When false, the sales price can still be added manually when a new item is created.

isLiveConversion.description: Flag that indicates if the sales price is converted live in the online store. When true, the default currency price will be converted into the active currencies based on the conversion rates saved in plentymarkets.

interval.description: The interval of the price. Possible values are: daily, weekly, monthly, quarterly, half-yearly and yearly.

salesPriceId.description: The unique ID of the sales price

referrerId.description: The ID of the referrer linked to the sales price

accountId.description: The ID of the referrer account linked to the sales price

createdAt.description: The time the referrer account was linked to the sales price.

updatedAt.description: The time the link was last updated.

salesPriceId.description: The unique ID of the sales price

countryId.description: The unique ID of the country

createdAt.description: The time the country was activated.

updatedAt.description: The time the relationship between country and sales price was last updated.

salesPriceId.description: The unique ID of the sales price

currency.description: The ISO code of the currency; -1 = all currencies.

createdAt.description: The time the currency was activated.

updatedAt.description: The time the relationship between currency and sales price was last updated.

salesPriceId.description: The unique ID of the sales price

customerClassId.description: The unique ID of the customer class

createdAt.description: The time the customer class was activated.

updatedAt.description: The time the relationship between customer class and sales price was last updated.

salesPriceId.description: The unique ID of the sales price

lang.description: The language code of the sales price name

nameInternal.description: The internal name of the sales price. The internal name is used in the plentymarkets back end only.

nameExternal.description: The external name of the sales price. The external name is displayed in the online store and as such is visible for customers.

createdAt.description: The time the name was created.

updatedAt.description: The time the name was last updated.

salesPriceId.description: The unique ID of the sales price

plentyId.description: The unique ID of the client (store)

createdAt.description: The time the client (store) was activated.

updatedAt.description: The time the relationship between the client (store) and the sales price was last updated.

salesPriceId.description: The unique ID of the sales price

referrerId.description: The unique ID of the referrer

createdAt.description: The time the referrer was activated.

updatedAt.description: The time the relationship between referrer and sales price was last updated.

id.description: The unique ID of the unit

position.description: The position of the unit

unitOfMeasurement.description: The International System of Units (ISO) code of the unit

isDecimalPlacesAllowed.description: Flag that indicates if decimal places are allowed for this unit of measurement. If false, only integer values are allowed for the unit.

unitId.description: The unique ID of the unit

lang.description: The language of the unit name

name.description: The name of the unit

id.description: The ID of the additional sku

variationId.description: The ID of the variation.

marketId.description: The ID of the market reference.

marketAccountId.description: The ID of the market account.

sku.description: The additional sku for this variation.

createdAt.description: The time the SKU was created (YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS).

updatedAt.description: The time the SKU was updated (YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS).

code.description: The code of the variation's barcode. The combination of code and barcode ID must be unique.

barcodeId.description: The unique ID of the barcode linked to the variation. The combination of code and barcode ID must be unique.

variationId.description: The unique ID of the variation

createdAt.description: The time the variation's code was created.

barcode.description: The barcode of the variation's barcode (Object)

id.description: The unique ID of the link that marks a variation as a bundle component

variationId.description: The unique ID of the variation to which other variations are added to create a bundle

componentVariationId.description: The unique ID of the variation added as bundle component

componentQuantity.description: The quantity of the variation to be added as bundle component

lastUpdatedTimestamp.description: The time the bundle was last updated.

createdAt.description: The time the bundle was created.

variationId.description: The unique ID of the variation

categoryId.description: The unique ID of the category

position.description: The position of the category

isNeckermannPrimary.description: Flag that indicates if the category is the primary category for the market Neckermann for this variation.

variationId.description: The unique ID of the variation

plentyId.description: The unique ID of the client (store)

createdAt.description: The time at which the client (store) was linked to the variation.

variationId.description: The unique ID of the variation

branchId.description: The unique ID of the category branch

plentyId.description: The unique plenty ID of the client (store)

id.description: The unique ID of the description

itemId.description: The unique ID of the item that this description belongs to

lang.description: The language code of the description

name.description: The default name of the item. By default, this name is displayed in the online store. For Default items, this name is also used for markets. Character limit: max. 240 characters.

name2.description: Alternative item name that can be used e.g. for markets. Character limit: max. 240 characters.

name3.description: Alternative item name that can be used e.g. for markets. Character limit: max. 240 characters.

previewDescription.description: The preview text. The preview text is a short description that can be displayed in item lists.

metaDescription.description: The meta description of the item. This description is analysed by search engines and displayed in search results. This text should be treated as an advertising text to maximise click-through from search engine result pages. Current recommended limit is 156 characters.

description.description: The item description. This is a detailed description displayed in the item layout of the online store.

technicalData.description: The technical data for the item. To display the technical data in the online store, insert the template variable TechnicalData and an optional title into the template ItemViewSingleItem.

urlPath.description: The URL path of the item in the online store. By default, the URL path consists of the categories and the item name. The path will be assigned automatically by plentymarkets when the item is created and will be displayed as part of the URL when the item is selected in the online store.

metaKeywords.description: Meta keywords to tag the item for search engines. More than one keyword can be separated by commas.

id.description: The unique ID of the link between a variation and an image

itemId.description: The unique ID of the item

variationId.description: The unique ID of the variation

imageId.description: The unique ID of the image

createdAt.description: The time the image was linked to the variation.

updatedAt.description: The time the link between an image and a variation was last updated.

id.description: The unique ID of the market ident number (ASIN/ePID) of a variation

variationId.description: The unique ID of the variation

countryId.description: The country code of the market ident number (ASIN/ePID)

type.description: The type of market ident number (ASIN/ePID)

position.description: The position of the market ident number  (ASIN/ePID)

value.description: The value of the market ident number (ASIN/ePID)

variationId.description: The unique ID of the variation

marketId.description: The unique ID of the market

createdAt.description: The time the link between the variation and the market was created.

id.description: The unique ID of the link between the variation and the property value

variationId.description: The unique ID of the variation

propertyId.description: The unique ID of the property

propertySelectionId.description: The unique ID of the property selection of the variation

valueInt.description: The int value of the property value of the variation

valueFloat.description: The float value of the property value of the variation

valueFile.description: The file value of the property value of the variation

surcharge.description: The surcharge of the property value of the variation

valueId.description: The unique ID of the link between the variation and the property

lang.description: The language of the property value text

value.description: The text saved for the property of the type Text

variationId.description: The unique ID of the variation

salesPriceId.description: The unique ID of the sales price

price.description: The price of the variation saved for this sales price

id.description: The row ID of the table plenty_item_variation_market_status

variationId.description: The ID of the variation

marketId.description: The ID of the market

accountId.description: The ID of the market account

initialSku.description: The initial SKU of the variation. The initial SKU cannot be modified even if the variation SKU is changed. However, it is possible to reset the variation SKU to the initial SKU.

sku.description: The SKU of the variation. The SKU is adjustable but may not exist twice for the combination of market Id and account Id.

parentSku.description: The Parent SKU of the variation. The Parent SKU is adjustable. The same Parent SKU value should be used on variations of same article.

isActive.description: Flag that indicates if the item is ready for export (currently not in use).

createdAt.description: The time the SKU was created (YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS).

updatedAt.description: The time the SKU was updated (YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS).

exportedAt.description: The time the variation was last exported (YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS).

deletedAt.description: The time the variation was deleted (YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS).

status.description: The status of the variation after the export. Possible entries are INACTIVE, ERROR, SENT and ACTIVE.

additionalInformation.description: The field that contains additional information.

itemId.description: The ID of the item

variationId.description: The ID of the variation

reservedListing.description: The quantity of a variation that is reserved for listings

reservedBundles.description: The quantity of a variation that is reserved for item bundles

valueOfGoods.description: The value of goods based on the physical stock

purchasePrice.description: The purchase price of the variation stock

physicalStock.description: The physical stock of the variation stock

reservedStock.description: The reserved stock of the variation stock

netStock.description: The net stock is the stock that can still be sold

reorderLevel.description: The quantity of a variation that triggers a reorder

deltaReorderLevel.description: The quantity of a variation that is required to reach the reorder level

id.description: The unique ID of the link between variation and supplier

variationId.description: The unique ID of the variation

supplierId.description: The unique ID of the supplier

purchasePrice.description: The price at which the variation was purchased from this supplier.

minimumPurchase.description: The minimum quantity of the variation that has to be ordered from the supplier. This value is also used as a quantity suggestion when creating reorders.

itemNumber.description: The external item number assigned to the variation by this supplier

lastPriceQuery.description: The date of the last price query to this supplier. This helps to plan price negotiations.

deliveryTimeInDays.description: The delivery time in days for the variation saved for this supplier

discount.description: The discount in percent the supplier grants for the variation.

isDiscountable.description: Flag that indicates if the supplier's discount for this variation is active.

packagingUnit.description: The packaging unit of the supplier if it differs from the packaging unit settings in plentymarkets.

lastUpdateTimestamp.description: The time the supplier data was last updated

createdAt.description: The time the supplier data was created

variationId.description: The unique ID of the variation

warehouseId.description: The unique ID of the warehouse

warehouseZoneId.description: The unique ID of the warehouse zone

storageLocationType.description: The storage location type of the warehouse

reorderLevel.description: The reorder level for the variation in this warehouse

maximumStock.description: The maximum stock for the variation in this warehouse

stockTurnoverInDays.description: The stock turnover in days for the variation in this warehouse

storageLocation.description: The storage location of the variation in this warehouse

stockBuffer.description: The stock buffer for the variation in this warehouse

isBatch.description: Is for warehouse and variation stock batch active

isBestBeforeDate.description: Is for warehouse and variation stock best before date active

lastUpdateTimestamp.description: The time the warehouse data was last updated.

createdAt.description: The time the warehouse data was created.

id.description: The ID of the variation. The ID must be unique.

isMain.description: Flag that indicates if the variation is the main variation of the item.

mainVariationId.description: The variation ID of the item's main variation. Value is NULL if this variation is the item's main variation.

itemId.description: The item ID of the item that this variation belongs to.

position.description: The position of the variation. Value is inherited from the item's main variation if inheritance is active.

isActive.description: Flag that indicates if the variation is active. Only active variations can be offered in the online store and/or on markets.

number.description: The unique variation number of the variation. The variation number must be specified.

model.description: The model of the variation. Value is inherited from the item's main variation if inheritance is active.

externalId.description: The external variation ID of this variation. The external variation number is optional and allows importing items and variations from external systems to plentymarkets.

availability.description: The availability of the variation. Possible values: 1 to 10, null = Variation inherits value of main variation.

estimatedAvailableAt.description: The estimated delivery date of variations on reorder.

purchasePrice.description: The net purchase price. Value e.g. is used for price calculations.

movingAveragePrice.description: The moving average purchase price of the variation.

createdAt.description: The time the variation was created.

updatedAt.description: The time the variation was last updated.

relatedUpdatedAt.description: The time at which related information for this variation was last updated. Related information is defined as information that is linked to the variation, i.e. barcodes, categories, images, markets, clients (stores), prices, suppliers, warehouses and the default category.

availabilityUpdatedAt.description: The time at which the availability of this variation was last updated.

priceCalculationId.description: The ID of the price calculation linked to the variation.

picking.description: The order picking type of the variation. Possible values: single_picking, no_single_picking, exclude_from_picklist, null (no order picking type)

stockLimitation.description:
The stock limitation for the variation. Possible values:
  • 0 = No limitation, i.e. stock is not limited. The variations's availability is not checked automatically.
  • 1 = Stock is limited to net stock. The variation's availability is checked automatically.
  • 2 = Do not administer stock for this variation.

isVisibleIfNetStockIsPositive.description: Flag that indicates if the variation is visible in the online store if net stock is positive. If true, the variation automatically becomes visible when the net stock changes to positive.

isInvisibleIfNetStockIsNotPositive.description: Flag that indicates if the variation is invisible in the online store if net stock is not positive. If true, the variation automatically becomes invisible when the net stock changes to 0 or negative.

isAvailableIfNetStockIsPositive.description: Flag that indicates if the variation is available in the online store if net stock is positive. If true, the variation automatically becomes available when the net stock changes to positive.

isUnavailableIfNetStockIsNotPositive.description: Flag that indicates if the variation is unavailable in the online store if net stock is not positive. If true, the variation automatically becomes available when the net stock changes to 0 or negative.

isVisibleInListIfNetStockIsPositive.description: Flag that indicates if the variation is visible in the item list of the online store if net stock is positive. If true, the variation automatically becomes visible in categories, search results and item lists (store specials, cross-selling, last seen items) when the net stock changes to positive.

isInvisibleInListIfNetStockIsNotPositive.description: Flag that indicates if the variation is invisible in the item list of the online store if net stock is not positive. If true and no net stock is available for the variation, the variation can only be opened using the direct URL. The variation is not shown in the categories, search results or item lists (store specials, cross-selling, last seen items).

mainWarehouseId.description: The ID of the main warehouse of the variation.

maximumOrderQuantity.description: The maximum order quantity permitted per order. Decimal values are possible to allow orders by weight or length. Default value is 0. If value is 0, the maximum order quantity is unlimited.

minimumOrderQuantity.description: The minimum order quantity. Decimal values are possible to allow orders by weight or length.

intervalOrderQuantity.description: The quantity intervals the variation can be ordered in. Decimal values are possible to allow orders by weight or length.

availableUntil.description: The last date the item will be available for sale.

releasedAt.description: The release date of the variation. This is the date on which the variation will become available. The variation can be visible in the online store before this date, e.g. for preorders.

name.description: The name of the variation

unitCombinationId.description: The unit combination id of the variation

weightG.description: The gross weight of the variation in gramms (g). This weight includes the packaging for variations that are packaged separately. This value is used for calculating shipping packages and weight-based shipping costs.

weightNetG.description: The net weight of the variation in gramms (g). This is the weight of the variation without packaging.

widthMM.description: The width of the variation in millimetres (mm)

lengthMM.description: The length of the variation in millimeters (mm)

heightMM.description: The height of the variation in millimetres (mm)

extraShippingCharge1.description: The extra shipping charge 1 for the variation. Extra shipping charges are useful for large or bulky items that are particularly expensive to ship. Charge 1 is added to the regular shipping costs for the first item of an order. If different variations are ordered, the extra shipping charge 1 of the variation with the highest charge 1 is selected.

extraShippingCharge2.description: The extra shipping charge 2 for the variation. Extra shipping charges are useful for large or bulky items that are expensive to ship. Charge 2 is added to the shipping costs for any additional items of an order.

unitsContained.description: The number of sales units contained in one package. Default value is 1.

palletTypeId.description: The ID of the pallet type

packingUnits.description: The number of packing units if the item consists of multiple packages. Value is 0 if an item is sent as one package. All items of an order that have the value 0 will be packed into one package.

packingUnitTypeId.description: The ID of the packing unit type.

transportationCosts.description: The net transportation costs for the variation. This value is used for price calculations and for calculating the acquisition price.

storageCosts.description: The net storage costs for the variation

operatingCosts.description: The operating costs for the variation in percent

vatId.description: The ID of the VAT rate of the variation. VAT rates are created for each client (store) and linked to the variation.

bundleType.description:
Indicates the bundle type of the variation. Possible values:
  • bundle = The variation is a bundle
  • bundle_item = The variation is a bundle component.
  • Null = The variation is not associated with a bundle

automaticClientVisibility.description:
Indicates if the variation is set as available for any clients (stores). Possible values:
  • 0 / -1 (GET) or 0 (POST) = Variation is not available in any client (store).
  • 1 / 2 (GET) or 1 (POST) = Variation is available in at least one client (store).
The variation's actual visibility depends on the settings for net stock dependency.

automaticListVisibility.description: Indicates if the variation currently is visible in item lists. 3 = Variation is visible in item list because $isHiddenInCategoryList is false. 2, 1 = Variation is visible in item list because $isVisibleInListIfNetStockIsPositive is true and net stock is positive. 0, -1 = Variation is invisible in item list because $isInvisibleInListIfNetStockIsNotPositive is true and net stock is 0 or negative. -2 = Variation is invisible in item list because $isHiddenInCategoryList is true.

isHiddenInCategoryList.description: Flag that indicates if the variation is hidden in the category list. If true, the variation will not be shown in any item category and will not be returned as a search result. The variation can only be accessed via its URL.

defaultShippingCosts.description: The default shipping costs for the variation.

mayShowUnitPrice.description: Display unit price in the online store

salesRank.description: The sales rank of the variation. This ranking is used to position top items automatically if the option Automatically sort by monthly sales (Settings » Client (store) » Standard » Item layouts » Basic settings) is set to Yes. The sales ranking is calculated daily. If the option Automatically sort by monthly sales is set to No, a value of 0 is returned and variations are sorted by position instead.

categoryVariationId.description:
Either the ID of the variation or the ID of the item's main variation. No other values are permitted.
  • ID of the variation = Categories are not inherited from the main variation.
  • ID of the item's main variation = Inheritance of categories is active.

marketVariationId.description:
Either the ID of the variation or the ID of the item's main variation. No other values are permitted.
  • ID of the variation = Markets are not inherited from the main variation.
  • ID of the item's main variation = Inheritance of markets is active.

clientVariationId.description:
Either the ID of the variation or the ID of the item's main variation. No other values are permitted.
  • ID of the variation = Clients (stores) are not inherited from the main variation.
  • ID of the item's main variation = Inheritance of clients (stores) is active.

salesPriceVariationId.description:
Either the ID of the variation or the ID of the item's main variation. No other values are permitted.
  • ID of the variation = Sales prices are not inherited from the main variation.
  • ID of the item's main variation = Inheritance of sales prices is active.

supplierVariationId.description:
Either the ID of the variation or the ID of the item's main variation. No other values are permitted.
  • ID of the variation = Suppliers are not inherited from the main variation.
  • ID of the item's main variation = Inheritance of suppliers is active.

warehouseVariationId.description:
Either the ID of the variation or the ID of the item's main variation. No other values are permitted.
  • ID of the variation = Warehouses are not inherited from the main variation.
  • ID of the item's main variation = Inheritance of warehouses is active.

propertyVariationId.description:
Either the ID of the variation or the ID of the item's main variation. No other values are permitted.
  • ID of the variation = Properties are not inherited from the main variation.
  • ID of the item's main variation = Inheritance of properties is active.

tagVariationId.description:
Either the ID of the variation or the ID of the item's main variation. No other values are permitted.
  • ID of the variation = Tags are not inherited from the main variation.
  • ID of the item's main variation = Inheritance of tags is active.

hasCalculatedBundleWeight.description: Indicates if the gross bundle weight is calculated by its components.

hasCalculatedBundleNetWeight.description: Indicates if the net bundle weight is calculated by its components.

hasCalculatedBundlePurchasePrice.description: Indicates if the net purchase price is calculated by its components.

hasCalculatedBundleMovingAveragePrice.description: Indicates if the moving average net purchase price is calculated by its components.

fulfillmentPolicyId.description: The ID of the fulfillment policy.

description.description: An optional seller-defined description of the fulfillment policy.

freightShipping.description: Set this value to true to indicate the seller offers freight shipping.

globalShipping.description: If this value is set to true, it indicates the seller has opted-in to the eBay Global Shipping Program and that they use that service for thier internation shipments.

localPickup.description: If this value is set to true, it indicates the seller offers local pickup of their items.

marketplaceId.description: The ID of the eBay marketplace to which this fulfillment policy applies. If this value is not specified, value defaults to the seller's eBay registration site.

name.description: A user-defined name for this fulfillment policy. Names must be unique for policies assigned to the same marketplace.

pickupDropOff.description: If this value is set to true, it indicates the seller offers the "Click and Collect" feature.

paymentPolicyId.description: The ID of the payment policy.

description.description: An optional seller-defined description of the payment policy. (Max length: 250)

immediatePay.description: Indicate if the payment is due upon receipt or not. (eBay generates a receipt when the buyer agrees to purchase an item)

marketplaceId.description: The ID of the eBay marketplace to which this return policy applies. If this value is not specified, value defaults to the seller's eBay registration site.

name.description: A user-defined name for this payment policy. Names must be unique for policies assigned to the same marketplace. (Max length: 64)

paymentInstructions.description: Allows the seller to give payment instructions to the buyer. These instructions appear on the eBay View Item and Checkout pages.

returnPolicyId.description: The ID of the return policy.

description.description: An optional seller-defined description of the return policy.

extendedHolidayReturnsOffered.description: If this value is set to true, it indicates the seller offers an Extended Holiday Returns policy for their listings.

marketplaceId.description: The ID of the eBay marketplace to which this return policy applies. If this value is not specified, value defaults to the seller's eBay registration site.

name.description: A user-defined name for this fulfillment policy. Names must be unique for policies assigned to the same marketplace.

refundMethod.description: Indicates the method the seller uses to compensate the buyer for returned items. The return method specified applies only to remorse returns. Available options: `MERCHANDISE_CREDIT`, `MONEY_BACK`.

restockingFeePercentage.description: Sellers who accept returns should include this field if they charge buyers a restocking fee when items are returned.

returnInstruction.description: This optional free-form string field lets the seller provide a detailed explanation of the return policy.

returnMethod.description: This field indicates the method in which the seller handles non-money back return requests for remorse returns. Sellers can specify they either exchange or replace items. Available options: `EXCHANGE`, `REPLACEMENT`.

returnsAccepted.description: Set this value to true to indicate the seller accepts returns.

returnShippingCostPayer.description: The seller uses this value to specify whether the buyer or the seller is responsible for paying return shipping charges. The field can be set to either `BUYER` or `SELLER`.

id.description: The ID of the category.

name.description: The name of the category.

isLeaf.description: Tells if the category is leaf.

name.description: A recommended Item Specific name.

minValues.description: Minimum number of values that you can specify for this Item Specific.

maxValues.description: Maximum number of values that you can specify for this Item Specific.

selectionMode.description: Controls whether you can specify your own name and value in listing requests, or if you need to use a name and/or value that eBay has defined.

valueType.description: The data type (e.g., date) that eBay expects the value to adhere to in listing requests. Only returned if the data type is not Text. In some cases, more details about the data type are returned in the `valueFormat` field.

valueFormat.description: The format of the data type (e.g., date format) that eBay expects the item specific's value to adhere to in listing requests. A data type identified by the `valueType` field may have different representations, and `valueFormat` specifies the precise format that is required.

helpText.description: Help-text defines the purpose of the Item Specific. The help text will be shown only when it is available for the particular Item Specific.

helpUrl.description: A page on the eBay Web site with context-specific help tips that provide useful information about this Item Specific. Only returned when an applicable page is available in the system.

variationPicture.description: Indicates whether the name (e.g., Color) can (or must) be used to classify the variation pictures

variationSpecifics.description: Indicates whether the recommended name/value pair can be used as variation attributes in a fixed-price listing call. For example, a given category could disable a name like Brand in variation specifics (if Brand is only allowed in the item specifics at the Item level). The same category could enable a name like Size for variation specifics (in addition to recommending it for item specifics). If not returned, then the name/value can be used for both variation specifics and item specifics.

siteId.description: The ID of the site exactly as eBay specifies it in the docs. This value is/was used in the old eBay SOAP APIs

marketplaceId.description: The ID of the marketplace exactly as eBay specifies it in the docs. This value is used in the new eBay REST APIs. Eg. `EBAY_DE` or `EBAY-DE`

marketId.description: System-Listing wide internal ID for the listing marketplace. This id occurs only in correlation with the listing DB tables.

referrerId.description: System wide internal ID for the marketplace. Use this instead of `marketId` whenever possible!

currency.description: The currency used for the marketplace

categoryId.description: The id of the category the fitment belongs to.

type.description: The type of the current market settings. Possible values are: attribute, attributeValue, property, category, shipping.

settings.description: The market settings for the current marketplace.

parentUuid.description: The uuid5 of the parent message.

whispered.description: Whether the message is wispered (not visible for the contact/order linked to the message) or not.

tags.description: An array with tag IDs assigned to the message

preview.description: The first two lines of the message without any markup

doneAt.description: The date the messages setted done.

text.description: The text of the contact wish

campaignId.description: The ID of the campaign that the code belongs to

disable.description:
Flag that indicates if a code is active or deactivated.
  • True = the code is deactivated
  • False = the code is active

consumed.description:
Flag that indicates if a code was redeemed or not.
  • True = the code was redeemed
  • False = the code is not redeemed

usedCount.description: How many times a code has been redeemed

usedAmount.description: The amount that is already redeemed. The total amount that can be redeemed is defined in the campaign as coupon value, because the value applies to all codes of a campaign.

value.description: The value of the coupon if it differs from the campaign value. The value is null if the campaign value is used.

validationType.description: The type of the campaign. Currently the only type available is plentymarkets.

contactId.description: The ID of the contact that wants to redeem the coupon

salesDiscount.description: The total discount from a coupon applied to an order. The discount is given as gross amount.

salesDiscountNet.description: The net discount from a coupon applied to an order. The net discount is the total discount minus the vat amount.

itemDiscount.description: The discount amount applied to items.

itemDiscountNet.description: The net discount applied to items.

shippingDiscount.description: The discount applied to shipping costs.

shippingDiscountNet.description: The net discount applied to shipping costs.

usedVatFields.description: The vat fields used for the validation

checkedItems.description: The list of variations that passed the validation

htmlCode.description: The html code (entity) for the currency.

unicodeSign.description: The unicode symbol for the currency. If no unicode symbol exists, the html code will be used.

  • True = Currency can be deleted

origin.description:
The origin of the payment. The following origins are available:
  • Undefined = 0
  • System = 1
  • Manually = 2
  • SOAP = 3
  • Import = 4
  • Split payment = 5
  • Plugin = 6
  • POS = 7

transactionType.description:
The transaction type of the payment. The following transaction types are available:
  • Interim transaction report = 1
  • Booked payment = 2
  • Split payment = 3

mopId.description: The ID of the payment method

regenerateHash.description: If $regenerateHash is true, regenerate the payment hash value. Default is false.

updateOrderPaymentStatus.description: If $updateOrderPaymentStatus is true, update the order payment status. Default is false.

isSystemCurrency.description: If $isSystemCurrency is false, the value will be converted to the standard currency with the provided exchange rate. If $isSystemCurrency is false, the value is not converted. Default is true.

The ID of the property type. The following property types are available:
  • Transaction ID = 1
  • Reference ID = 2
  • Booking text = 3
  • Transaction password = 4
  • Transaction code = 5
  • Authorisation ID = 6
  • Capture ID = 7
  • Refund ID = 8
  • Credit note ID = 9
  • Order reference = 10
  • Name of the sender = 11
  • Email of the sender = 12
  • The sender's sort code = 13
  • The sender's bank name = 14
  • The sender's bank account number = 15
  • The holder of the bank account = 16
  • The country of the sender's bank account = 17
  • The sender's IBAN = 18
  • The sender's BIC = 19
  • Name of the recipient = 20
  • The recipient's bank account = 21
  • Reference text of the payment = 22
  • Payment origin = 23
  • Shipping address ID = 24
  • Invoice address ID = 25
  • Item buyer = 26
  • Item number = 27
  • Item transaction ID = 28
  • External transaction type = 29
  • External transaction status = 30
  • The receiver's IBAN = 31
  • The receiver's BIC = 32
  • Transaction fee = 33
  • Transaction lifespan = 34
